definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
DPP (Democratic Progressive Party, Taiwan)/abbr. to 民進黨|民进党
Modesty leads to progress, arrogance makes you drop behind (favorite slogan of Mao Zedong)
pinyin: xu1 xin1 shi3 ren2 jin4 bu4 , jiao1 ao4 shi3 ren2 luo4 hou4
containing_words.word: 虚心使人进步，骄傲使人落后

sentences.english: In 1999, ethnic unity and progress has been exemplary Linying advanced individuals.
sentences.chinese: 1999年，获临颍县民族团结进步模范先进个人。

sentences.english: Inter-group cooperation is the engine of real progress at the grassroots.
sentences.chinese: 在基层民众中，组织内部的合作更是真正进步的动力。

sentences.english: It helped anchor Asia as the future of economic and technological advancement.
sentences.chinese: 它帮助掌握亚洲未来的经济和科技进步的方向。

sentences.english: With the development of detective methods, the concept of transdifferentiation is being accepted by people.
sentences.chinese: 随着检测手段的进步，转分化正逐渐被人们认同。

sentences.english: <div class="cfx">The list also reflected breakneck advances in supercomputing speeds.
sentences.chinese: 这份排名还反映了在超级计算速度方面的极快进步。

sentences.english: This is a unique opportunity to get a progressive politician to be the president of the council.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个令进步政治家成为理事会主席得大好机会。

sentences.english: Most parents are anxious for their children's advancement.
sentences.chinese: 大多数父母都为自己孩子的进步感到焦虑。

sentences.english: All this may be the price we pay for progress.
sentences.chinese: 这一切都可能是我们为进步付出的代价。

sentences.english: "Think of all the tremendous progress in silicon photonics, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “你想一想硅光方面的所有巨大进步，”他说。

sentences.english: Ji maintained that "Cultural exchange is the main drive for humankind`s progress.
sentences.chinese: 季羡林认为，“文化交流是人类进步的主要动力之一。

sentences.english: The cause of human progress has a bright prospect in the new century.
sentences.chinese: 在新的世纪里，人类的进步事业具有光明的前景。

sentences.english: Colleague: In that case, all of us can make the progress at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 同事:如果那样的话，我们就能共同进步了。

sentences.english: Pedro, the improvements that Sauber have made, can you maintain those?
sentences.chinese: 德拉罗萨，索伯取得的进步，你可以保持住这些吗？

sentences.english: It is important that he improves very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 他的进步非常神速，这点很重要。

sentences.english: The product obtained third prize of BengBu Technical Progress in 2005.
sentences.chinese: 该产品荣获2005年蚌埠市科技进步三等奖。

definition: to do less well than before/to make a concession/setback/backward step/leeway/room to maneuver/fallback
to advance by leaps and bounds
to forge ahead vigorously/to dedicate oneself to progress
to try hard to catch up
